data.name: Wildfall
data.detailed_description:
Choose whether you want to enter the beautiful Open World of Wildfall alone or with up to three of your friends.
Explore new islands, find hidden treasures and fight off a huge variety of different monsters.
Help the once in peace living island dwellers regain control over a huge area what once belonged to them in this First-Person-Coop RPG!

Discover a Dream Like World
Explore four themed, action packed islands, filled with hundreds of different monsters, traders, villagers and hidden caves.
Pick your favorite mount and charge it into battle. Fight side by side with your friends online or try to free up these huge islands on your own.

Define Your Style
No matter what hero you pick, you are the one making the decisions.
Fighter, Tank, Ranger or Mage? You decide which road you're gonna take.
Want to try out different styles of combat? Reskill your abilities to your liking and make your perfect character.

data.short_description: Explore new islands, find hidden treasures and fight off a huge variety of different monsters. Help the once in peace living island dwellers regain control over a huge area what once belonged to them in this First-Person-Coop RPG!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 (High Settings) and 1070 (Ultra Settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High Settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
